column1: #Text=Secondly , you start up by first getting capital .
#Text=You should start small but , remember think big and grow fast ( Fela Durotoye ) .

#Text=If you are able to fund the business yourself well , good for you but , if you ca n’t ; get investors check www.nairaland.com/investment , www.founded.com/ or just Google it ( www.google.com/search ) .
#Text=You can also lend your capital from friends and family if you are trust worthy or get a bank loan .
#Text=Next you set up your shop , store or whatever , and you can also set up online easy ; Google it or better still hire experts if you do n’t know any , trywww .
#Text=SoutechVentures.com.
#Text=" >

column1: #Text=Most importantly The God Factor .
#Text=Everybody can figure out how to start and run a business online or anywhere else but , you need an extra/supernatural wisdom to keep it afloat .
#Text=God created us to be able to know/see with our hearts ; there is more to us than what we can see , hear , smell , and touch .
#Text=The God Factor is the faith tool you need for your business and for your life { Hebrew 11:1
#Text=now faith is the assurance of things hoped for , the conviction/evidence of things not seen ( in the physical ) } .
#Text=Faith is real ; as real as you and me it is the ability to receive what you have asked and understand that you have received it now and not praying to receive it later .
#Text=Faith is like when you ordered that car or whatever from a shop or a person abroad or anywhere .
#Text=You have the receipt you know it ’s yours .
#Text=You ’ve seen pictures all that is left , is for it to get to your physical location .
#Text=Faith is the receipt , Faith are those pictures , and Faith is that tracking software that tracks its location ; that tells you that it ’s still on the way .
#Text=At this point you rejoices , you tell people about that thing that ’s on its way .
#Text=You are excited everyone around you is excited
#Text=you do n’t get surprised when you see it you ’ve already seen it .
#Text=The God Factor is the most important tool
#Text=grab onto the reality of your successful business and by the time it arrives at your door , you would have already ordered/seen the next level .
#Text={ By faith we understand that the universe was created by the word of God , so that what is seen was not made out of things that are visible Verse 3 } .
